requirements.title: Manager Reporting Support
requirements.description: The system will provide reporting functionalities specifically designed for managers.

acceptance_criteria.then: The system will provide reporting functionalities specifically designed for managers.

requirements.original_intent: The system should support reporting for managers.

requirements.title: Report Generation for Managers
requirements.description:
Actor: Manager

Action: Generate reports

System Behavior: The system allows managers to generate reports based on predefined criteria.

Expected Outcome: Managers can access and generate reports relevant to their needs.

Observable Result: Reports are generated successfully and can be viewed by managers.

acceptance_criteria.given: A manager is logged into the system
acceptance_criteria.when: The manager selects the report generation option
acceptance_criteria.then: The system displays available reporting options

acceptance_criteria.given: The manager selects a reporting option
acceptance_criteria.then: The system generates the report and displays it to the manager

inferred_logic: Assumption: The system has predefined reporting templates available for managers.
gaps: Specific types of reports needed by managers are not defined.
Criteria for report generation are not specified.
risks: [functional] Lack of clarity on report requirements may lead to incomplete or irrelevant reports. (Severity: medium)
ambiguities: Specific types of reports needed by managers are not defined.
Criteria for report generation are not specified.
